news.title: Robinhood says SEC dismissed crypto unit investigation in latest sign of easier regulation for industry
news.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission is dropping its investigation into Robinhood's crypto arm, the company said Monday. Robinhood is a popular app that lets users buy and sell Bitcoin.

news.title: Apple to open AI server factory in Texas as part of $500 billion U.S. investment
news.summary: Apple will open a 250,000-square-foot AI server manufacturing facility in Houston, Texas. Apple said it will work with partners to open the facility.

news.title: 'Uphill battle' ahead: Trump, business leaders and economists react to German election result
news.summary: There's a distinct feeling of déjà vu in Berlin following the federal election. A new chapter in German politics begins on Monday following the election.

news.title: Berkshire operating earnings surge 71% in fourth quarter, cash hoard balloons to record $334 billion
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway reported fourth-quarter results on Saturday. The company's Class A shares popped more than 25% in 2024.

news.title: Here's why Trump tariffs may raise your car insurance premiums
news.summary: If they take effect, tariffs are expected to raise costs for insurers to repair or replace cars. This could lead to higher premiums for auto insurance.

news.title: The ‘Magnificent Seven’ are out; these stocks are in — but there’s one catch
news.summary: Japanese yen carry-trade unwind could again tank the stock market. The yen carry trade unwind has been seen as a key factor in the recent stock market sell-off.

news.title: Why the Apollo economist who coined ‘no-landing’ now sees intensifying risks to the U.S. economy
news.summary: Policy uncertainty is no friend to animal spirits, says a leading economist. Policy uncertainty is not a good thing for animals, says an expert on animal spirits.

news.title: Who needs a CEO? Not Intel. Its stock has soared this month without one.
news.summary: Intel joins short list of companies doing well without permanent CEOs. But balance of corporate power still tips toward having someone at the helm.

news.title: Domino’s Pizza’s stock slides on revenue and earnings miss as U.S. same-store sales disappoints
news.summary: Domino's reported weaker-than-expected U.S. same-store-sales growth. Domino’s reported weaker than-expected growth.

news.title: This social-media star helps women get richer. Here are her top money tips.
news.summary: Tori Dunlap, founder of Her First $100K, says, “A financial education is the best form of protest.”
